turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order from Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order an iced espresso double shot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. iced espresso, double shot. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what is your preferred pick up location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the Peet's on 50 Congress Street in Boston, Massachusetts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done. your coffee should be ready for pick up soon. You will receive a text message with your receipt.
